trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service runs, or can run, in a mode that is compatible with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].
[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode allows [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services to use ASP features such as identity impersonation.
It is enabled at the application level through the Web.config file and cannot be overridden by Web.config files nested in the application.
When the AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value is not specified for a service, it gets Allowed behavior by default.

[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services can run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
